meanings.definition: The quality of being extraordinary or remarkable.
meanings.sent1: Her performance on stage was filled with incredibleness.
meanings.sent2: The incredibleness of the view from the mountaintop took my breath away.
meanings.sent3: The incredibleness of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The incredibleness of the storm's power was both terrifying and fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The incredibleness of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult to believe or accept.
meanings.sent1: The incredibleness of the news left everyone in shock.
meanings.sent2: His story had an air of incredibleness that made it hard to trust.
meanings.sent3: The incredibleness of the excuse made us all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The incredibleness of the situation was like something out of a movie.
meanings.sent5: The incredibleness of the coincidence was too much to ignore.
